GlobalSettings.ForceManualTransitionTooltip: Check this if you would like to force the user to manually change slides.
GlobalSettings.HideDirectionNavigationTooltip: Check this if you only want the Next and Previous navigation to be visible only when hovering.
GlobalSettings.NavigationNextTooltip: The text for the navigation alternative Next.
GlobalSettings.NavigationPreviousTooltip: The text for the navigation alternative Previous.
GlobalSettings.NumberOfBoxColumnsText: Number of box columns (for box effects)
GlobalSettings.NumberOfBoxColumnsTooltip: If you are using a box effect, this is where you enter the number of columns that you want.
GlobalSettings.NumberOfBoxRowsText: Number of box rows (for box effects)
GlobalSettings.NumberOfBoxRowsTooltip: If you are using a box effect, this is where you enter the number of rows that you want.
GlobalSettings.NumberOfSlicesTooltip: If you are using a slice effect, this is where you enter the number of slices that you want.
GlobalSettings.PauseOnHoverTooltip: Check this if you would like to prevent the switching to the next image slide while hovering over the images.
GlobalSettings.RandomStartTooltip: Check this if you would like to start the slide show on a random slide each time.
GlobalSettings.SlidePauseText: Time to pause on each slide (ms)
GlobalSettings.SlidePauseTooltip: The time that each image slide is shown before switching to the next one; entered in milliseconds.
GlobalSettings.StartSlideIndexText: Start on slide number (0 is first)
GlobalSettings.StartSlideIndexTooltip: The index of the image slide to start from; it is zero based, meaning the first slide is number 0, the second is number 1, and so on.
GlobalSettings.ThemeTooltip: The slide show theme changes the appearance of the slide show when shown to the visitor. New themes can be added through the EPiServer Admin Mode.
GlobalSettings.ThemeText: Theme (only default available in this version)
GlobalSettings.TransitionEffectTooltip: The transition effect that transforms one image slide into the next one.
GlobalSettings.TransitionSpeedTooltip: The time it will take to finish the transition between image slides; entered in milliseconds.
GlobalSettings.UseDirectionNavigationTooltip: Check this if you want to use the Next and Previous navigation.
GlobalSettings.UseIndexedNavigationTooltip: Check this if you want to use indexed navigation.
GlobalSettings.UseThumbnailsForIndexedNavigationTooltip: Check this if you would like to use thumbnails instead of digits in the indexed navigation.

SlideEditor.ImageCaption: Image caption (HTML is allowed, no caption if empty)
SlideEditor.ImageLinksUrl: Image link URL (slide will not be linked if empty)
SlideEditor.Title: Image slide editor
